name: City School Bus: Drive Mission
description:
City School Bus: Drive Mission is an addictive and absolutely FREE to play fun drive simulation game that brings for you realistic coach drive of crazy school bus on big city roads. In this school bus driver simulation you can feel best thrilling and amazing school bus driving experience in most realistic beautiful 3D city environment.
Features

• Adventurous & Exciting levels.
• Realistic yellow school bus driving
• Extreme School bus driving through city roads
• Beautiful 3D city Rushy Environment to Explore
• Pick n drop school kids
• Smooth and easy controls and fun gameplay
